content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

Isabelle/VSCode has been announced several times on this mailing list
already. See also the blog post
http://sketis.net/2017/isabellevscode-1-0-in-isabelle2017

The main entry point for trying it out is
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=makarius.Isabelle2017

Makarius
